pkgmetadata.longdescription: ===================inscreen_sdk_server===================A changelog is available in the `GitHub releases page <https://github.com/inscreen/sdk-server/releases>`_.A feature comparison between different SDKs can be found in the `global README <https://github.com/inscreen/sdk-server/blob/main/README.md>`_.createInScreenToken===================Use this method to create secure session tokens for inScreen... code:: python import inscreen_sdk_server inscreen_token = inscreen_sdk_server.create_inscreen_token( api_key, v=1, user_id='USER_ID_HERE', team_id='TEAM_ID_HERE' )
